name: Humanity Attack Alien
description:
Humanity Attack Alien is a game filled with adventure, fun, and thrill as it promises nothing but non-stop action. Now you are alone on a battlefront. Use whatever you can find to win space war. Special technology, that will help cooling down your weapons and could help you to fight with alien dictatorship. You will have to face new challenges in each level that will make the gameplay more fun and exciting. Each level will have aliens invading different parts of the city that you will have to rescue from aliens.
Features:
- Realistic and highly detailed 3D city environment
- Fascinating and thrilling sound effects
- Bullets and rifles store to upgrade
- A highly detailed map
- Easy to Difficult game modes
- A wide range of challenging missions.
